reviews.review: my friend always dies on first hook while i stand there and watch him, I would def recommend you get a good laugh.
one of the most fun games that i have played in the horrorish genre i play it all the times with my friends and it is still fun to play by yourself even though the community is a little toxic
fun to play with friends who carry

nossa esse jogo é perfeitamente esplêndido
This game is pretty mid ngl. But one time we stream sniped this kid and he got really mad and banned both of my twitch accounts. It's those moments that make this game worth it.
super fun to play in general whether by yourself as the killer, as a group in custom games or in public survival matches, i highly recommend this game.
Just don't. I promise you will be better off without starting this game. Go get hunie pop or something your better off.
Highly addicting and fun thriller to play with friends. Try and make it out alive as a survivor or demolish with the killer creates a great change of pace compared to most games.

Very fun when games work properly, however, there is a lot of aspects of the game that need to be altered or deleted. Such as, camping someone on the hook shouldn't be a stratigy, it should be against the rules. There are also a large amount of overpowered killers.

The game is very fun! The only thing that can make a lot of people upset is how toxic killers can be, sometimes they're tunneling and camping. But if we think of it, that kind of people is basically in most of the games so you know, always happens sometimes but not always. I still have a lot of fun playing this game with my friends !
this game has SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO many errors now ... u get dropped in games , in lobby and even before u can even load the game up. THEY DONT EVEN CARE
bad game, laggy buggy crashes in the middle of games un balanced fix some of the stupidness and mabye itd be a good game
This game is very fun and super friendly! 10/10 would buy again just to experience this fan base one more time!!
Best way to waste valuable time!

Would recommend but beware of toxic community and a slight learning curve at the beginning.

This game is one of the most fun games i have played with my friends and solo. It is exhilarating, stressful and scary at times. After playing many hours the horror and fright will fade, perks and play style matter more for killers and coordination is the most important for survivors. 

Like most competitive games, toxicity in the community is there. Salty killers and survivors, insults are flung, excuses are made, prides and egos are hurt from the teabags and BM. (Exhibit A: "Stop tunneling/slugging" = stop punishing my flashlight attempts.)

Despite the shortcomings, this is a very fun game to give a chance on. It was scary for me at first, friends make it funny when everyone is screaming from a Myers. There are mechanics explainations and game strats that you can find on YouTube for getting "gud", if you are a beginner or finding it hard to get wins.
Achei um excelente jogo pra passar o tempo livre.
THIS GAME SUCKS AND PEOPLE WHO HAVE MORE THEN 20 HOURS ON IT SUCK MADS AMOUNT OF PENIS

Its an overall fun game, its best to play with friends as you will have a more enjoyable time. there are friendly people in this community but you will come across a lot of toxic people as well why I recommend  having friends to play with if your doing survivor.
Un juego muy divertido para jugar, ya sea con amigos o solo.
The devs put in more time creating cosmetics than fixing bugs or being face camped all match. 10/10 would play.
NO this game takes way to long to update. I went to taco bell and get a tattoo came back and im still fucking waiting for it to patch notes. other then that great game :)
i love it its super fun
Better with friends. This game hates me. I hate me. Good game

The game itself is awesome and one of the best of its kind. But the big problem, which is ruining this game for so many people, is that there are way to many killers that just camp, there are some rank penalitys that you get a lower score, but who cares about that?!?! They must finally find a way to deal with all those campers, they're ruining the game. As long as there's nothing they do to finally solve this problem I DON'T recommend it, only if you wanna play it with 4 friends and you only play private lobby. I mean it doesn't has to be something of a big change that no single person camps anymore, it would be enough when they at least say there will be harder penalitys for that and add them in the future. I know it's hard to auto-detect who was really camping, but guys you really have to do something against them, they're ruining your amazing game.
jeux de haute facture sauf quand tes pd de mates te décrochent devant le tueur.....
Me dá medo, mas eu gosto.
ye good game not enough people play at 12:00 tho

It´s really fun and balanced for both Killers and Survivors
despite the toxic player base this game is indeed addicting and fun to me
this game is fun nothing else to say would highly recommend
